column3: â€œI've purchased Liberty Haze by Vashon Velvet and it is extremely potent, with a THC content of 26.71%! column3: â€œSo nice. I've started the day with this strain and it's very pleasant.  The corners of your mouth automatically go up. Erases anxiety. You feel like you're just on the verge of laughing out loud, even at things that might not be ...â€

â€œIn my top 5 favorite list.  Love this strain on so many levels.  Hit is smooth and taste is awesome.  Hints of smokey citrus with a unique finish that I can't quite pin down but like, a lot! column3: â€œNice lime aroma. Anxiety inducing in high doses, but added a certain sense of wonder to my day otherwise. Very forgetful high - remembering which train I was meant to be getting on was a nightmare, and my short term memory was still impaired a week later, but it didn't bother me much.â€

â€œA nice solid, dense strain. Smokes very well in both spliffs and bongs. When it grinds up it's very fluffy and soft like fresh cotton. It also gives off a nice amount of pollen. 

To conclude, would I get this again? Yes I would.
Would I recommend it; certainly!â€

â€œBought at Barney's Amsterdam. Potent hybrid that feels sativa-dominant. Focused, energetic and very creative high. Post-peak it gives a tingly body experience with shifts between being focussed and spacing out.â€
